metadata.title: CVE-2022-1049 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Pacemaker configuration tool (pcs). The pcs daemonwas allowing expired accounts, and accounts with expired passwords to loginwhen using PAM authentication. Therefore, unprivileged expired accountsthat have been denied access could still login.

criterions.comment: pcs package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
